snippet: The decision to remove the item was a departure for the news and gossip website, which pushes the limits of privacy.
abstract: Editorial staff at Gawker news and gossip website is incensed after founder and chief Nick Denton removes article hinting at sexual indiscretions of major media executive; original posting was widely condemned by readers and move to take it down marks first time site has formally retracted a story for anything other than legal or factual reasons.
lead_paragraph: The decision to remove the item was a departure for the news and gossip website, which pushes the limits of privacy.

headline.main: Gawker Retracts an Article After Criticism, and Gets More Brickbats From Its Staff
